name: Prystino Technologies
tag_list: the-fancy-clone-script, the-fancy-clone-script-php, taskrabbit-clone-script, html-5-development, psd---html5, psd---xhml, twitter-bootstrap, clone-script-provider
overview:
Prystino Technologies specializes in HTML5 development and HTML 5 custom website development services including PSD to HTML5/ CSS3, PSD to Responsive Web Design (RWD),PSD to XHTML, PSD to jQuery Mobile, PSD to Twitter Bootstrap, PSD to 960 Grid System, PSD to HTML5 Foundation.

Prystino is becoming a dominant provider in the cutting edge product development as well. It has released various clone scripts to its worldwide customers. Go Adore & TaskGenie is the clone scripts offered. Go Adore: Go Adore is one of the most popular social commerce script and which can also be used as “The Fancy Clone” script. This clone script is a part store, blog, gift & wish list and much more. The script is developed in LAMP Technology and ships in CodeIgniter MVC. Task Genie: Task Genie has been popularly known as Taskrabbit clone script. It’s an online marketplace that allows the buyer and seller connect virtually and get the tasks done in a more peaceful manner.This micro job board script that will enable the customer to run a website like taskrabbit.com and fiverr.com.
